list.title: Asteroid
list.description: Constructs a new Asteroid instance.

list.title: Asteroid#initCelesitalDetails
list.description: Initializes celestial details specific to the asteroid. This method overrides the parent class's implementation to add a Type property.

Constructor

Creates a new instance of the Collectible class.

list.title: Collectible#getAmount
list.description:
Get the amount of the collectible

Returns the amount of the collectible.

list.title: Collectible#getType
list.description:
Get the type of the collectible

Returns the type of the collectible.

list.title: FuelManager
list.description: Creates an instance of the FuelManager class.

list.title: FuelManager#capacity
list.description: The maximum amount of fuel that the system can hold.

list.title: FuelManager#consumeFuel
list.description: Consumes fuel based on the specified amount of activity.

list.title: FuelManager#consumptionRate
list.description: The rate at which fuel is consumed per unit of activity.

list.title: FuelManager#fuel
list.description: The current amount of fuel.

list.title: FuelManager#getFuelLevel
list.description: Gets the current fuel level.

list.title: FuelManager#refuel
list.description: Refuels the system by a specified amount.

list.title: GameConfig#GameConfig
list.description: Game configuration class. Initializes default values and sets up the GUI.

list.title: GameConfig#addEventListener
list.description: Adds an event listener for a specific event.

list.title: GameConfig#dispatchEvent
list.description: Dispatches an event to all registered listeners.

list.title: GameConfig#getDatGui
list.description: Creates a dat.GUI interface for modifying game configuration. Adds folders and controllers for each configuration property. Sets up range values and step sizes for each controller.

list.title: GameConfig#initAll
list.description: Initializes all configuration properties to their default values.

list.title: GameConfig#removeEventListener
list.description: Removes an event listener for the specified event.

list.title: GameConfig#resetAll
list.description: Resets all configuration properties to their default values.

list.title: GameConfig#resetProperty
list.description: Resets a specific configuration property to its default value.

list.title: GameConfig#updateGui
list.description: Updates the GUI to reflect the current configuration values. Goes over all folders and controllers and updates their display.

list.title: InventoryManager
list.description:
Constructor

Creates a new instance of the InventoryManager class.

list.title: InventoryManager#addResource
list.description:
Add a collectible to the inventory

This method adds a collectible to the inventory. The collectible is an object with a type and an amount. The type is a string that represents the type of resource, and the amount is a number that represents the quantity of the resource.

If the inventory has enough capacity to hold the collectible, the collectible is added to the inventory and the method returns true. Otherwise, the collectible is not added to the inventory and the method returns false.

list.title: InventoryManager#getTotalResources
list.description:
Get the total amount of resources in the inventory

This method returns the total amount of resources in the inventory. The total amount is calculated by summing the amount of each resource type in the inventory.

list.title: InventoryManager#removeResource
list.description:
Remove a resource from the inventory

This method removes a resource from the inventory. The resource is identified by its type, which is a string that represents the type of resource, and the amount is a number that represents the quantity of the resource to remove.

If the inventory has enough of the specified resource, the resource is removed from the inventory and the method returns true. Otherwise, the resource is not removed from the inventory and the method returns false.

list.title: Perlin
list.description: Create a Perlin noise generator.

list.title: Perlin#amplitude
list.description: Amplitude of the noise.

list.title: Perlin#fractalNoise
list.description: Generates fractal noise (fBM) using multiple octaves.

list.title: Perlin#frequency
list.description: Frequency of the noise.

list.title: Perlin#noise
list.description: Generates 3D Perlin noise with applied frequency and amplitude.

list.title: Perlin#rawNoise
list.description: Generates raw 3D Perlin noise for given coordinates.

list.title: Spacecraft#getForwardVector
list.description: Returns the forward vector based on the current orientation.

list.title: Spacecraft#getRightVector
list.description: Returns the right vector based on the current orientation.

list.title: Spacecraft#getUpVector
list.description: Returns the up vector based on the current orientation.

list.title: createGoldbergPolyhedron
list.description:
Creates a Goldberg-like polyhedron from scratch by:

  1. Defining base icosahedron vertices and faces mathematically.
  2. Subdividing those faces a given number of times.
  3. Projecting new vertices onto a sphere (and applying random height perturbations).

list.title: createGoldbergPolyhedron~addVertex
list.description: Helper: add a new THREE.Vector3 to finalPositions, return its index. If the vertex is already stored, reuse the existing index.

list.title: createGoldbergPolyhedron~subdivideTriangle
list.description: Helper: subdivide a single triangle [v1, v2, v3] recursively. v1, v2, v3 are THREE.Vector3 positions on the unit sphere.

list.title: getIntersectedObject
list.description: Gets the currently intersected object, if any.

list.title: module:NameGenerator
list.description: Generates random names for celestial bodies based on weighted syllable structures. The names are composed of random vowels and consonants, arranged in patterns.

list.title: module:NameGenerator.generateRandomName
list.description: Generates a random name for a celestial body. The name consists of a combination of vowels and consonants, structured by weighted syllable types.

list.title: setSeed
list.description: Allows switching or editing the seed at runtime with an integer

list.title: setupInteraction
list.description: Sets up interaction handlers for a Three.js scene, including mouse movement, click events, and keyboard interactions.

list.title: setupInteraction~detectRaycast
list.description: Detects raycast intersections and updates the currently intersected object. Should be called periodically, e.g., within an animation loop.

list.title: setupInteraction~onClick
list.description: Handles mouse click events. If the shift key is pressed and an object is intersected, the camera focuses on the intersected object.

list.title: setupInteraction~onKeyPress
list.description: Handles key press events. Resets the camera focus if the 'r' key is pressed.

list.title: setupInteraction~onMouseMove
list.description: Handles mouse move events and updates the mouse position for raycasting.

list.title: setupInteraction~setIntersectedObject
list.description: Sets the currently intersected object and updates its material's emissive color.

list.title: src/systems/configs/gameConfig.js
list.description: This file contains the GameConfig class which is used to manage the configuration settings for the game. It includes methods for initializing, resetting, and updating configuration properties, as well as managing event listeners. The configuration properties are also exposed to a dat.GUI interface for easy manipulation.
